Package sim

Interface Simulation

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimulationClass
public interface Simulation
Represents the simulation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    AntCycle

  • Method Details

    • init

      void init() throws InvalidPathException
      Sets the move events for all the ants in the colony.
      Throws:
      InvalidPathException - if the ant when moving finds an invalid path.

    • run

      void run() throws InvalidPathException
      Runs an iteration of the simulation.
      Throws:
      InvalidPathException - if the iteration has an invalid path.

    • getTopCycles

      Iterator<AntCycle> getTopCycles(int topNum)
      Gets the top cycles (not including the best Hamiltonian cycle).
      Parameters:
      topNum - the number of top cycles we want to find
      Returns:
      the top cycles without including the best Hamiltonian one.

    • getBestCycle

      AntCycle getBestCycle()
      Gets the best cycle, that is the first position of the list of cycles.
      Returns:
      the path with the best Hamiltonian cycle.

    • getGraph

      WeightedGraph<Integer,Node<Integer>,WeightedEdge<Integer>> getGraph()
      Gets the graph.
      Returns:
      the graph.

    • getPEC

      EventContainer getPEC()
      Gets the PEC.
      Returns:
      the PEC.
